Projects.description: Developed a game which tests a user’s skill in sign language using machine learning. Trained an object detection algorithm by utilizing Tensorflow API. Used python to create a menu, game mechanics, and point system.

Projects.shortDescription: Home page for Kellogg's Doll Houses
Projects.description: Developed an exclusively front-end website which displays basic information about the company in texts and provides. galleries of Dollhouse commissions. Deployed Cyberduck to create web pages and make the website public.

Developing a turn-based grand strategy game which utilizes first person shooter combat mechanics. Utilizing unreal engine’s blueprint tool to create NPCs which make decision-based actions based on data inputted from Unreal Engines’ ”AI Perception” feature.

Created an AWK compiler by coding Lexer, Parser, and Interpreter classes to run awk scripts and congruently interpret input files. Utilized HashMaps to store variable data (within the awk scripts), deployed Java’s Optional class to parse through awk scripts, and applied JUnit tests to test functionality. Github Repo for this project is available upon request.

Jobs.description: Assisted students in Information in the 21st Century (CINF 101x) at the University at Albany
Developing application using virtual reality, computer vision, and machine learning to help firefighters detect and protect themselves from fire hazards

Assisted in tabletop exercises of recovery plan and helped prepare written reports for the DR (Disaster Recovery) team, which has the objective of documenting emergency plans for organizations to follow. Participated in tabletop exercises in which we would simulate disasters for the critical applications to then implement their recovery plan. Analyzed system specifications in order to document and formalize a recovery plan.

Participate on teams for projects that have a Web functional component. Prepare size and scope analysis and timeline documentation. Perform development tasks on all areas of applications including front, middle, and back-end. Front-end web technologies include JSP, JSF, HTML, JavaScript, and Cascading Style Sheets. Middle-tier technologies include Servlet, JSP, Action-based frameworks, and Ajax/web-services. Back-end technologies include SQL/JDBC/JPA with DB2/SQL Server, CICS, and JMS/MQ. Create development test plans and prepare and/or refresh test conditions and associated accounts. Following the test plan, execute unit, run stream, subsystem, and regression tests as needed. Review all test results, comparing the results to the identified conditions. Debug and rerun as needed.

Developed a gpt-based onboarding bot which gives new users useful information regarding the common tools which are used by various teams, and provides answers of commonly asked questions. Created with python’s Openai API and langchain API to develop the bot which pulls the useful information off a vectorstore database, and uses the Flask API to host the bots’ services. Utilized ReactJS, Javascript, Figma, and storybook for developing the UI for the bot. Collaborated with team members to manage version control using Github and docker.
